DOC.brief_summary: Study to investigate the safety and efficacy of long-term daily use of Trazenta® Tablets as add-on therapy in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus.
DOC.brief_title: PMS of Trazenta on the Long-term Use as Add-on Therapy
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus who are treated with antidiabetic drugs and have never been treated with Trazenta® Tablets (linagliptin) before enrollment will be included. Exclusion criteria:
